title.rendered: “The Lost Kingdom, A True Tale” Proposes a ‘Cure’ to the Human Condition

content.rendered:
The Lost Kingdom, A True Tale eBook cover art

A new eBook by personal development mentor Christian Alexander aims to help readers find meaning in life

MOBILE, ALABAMA, UNITED STATES, July 12, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Christian Alexander Incorporated today released “The Lost Kingdom, A True Tale,” a fantastic story told through a modern-day lens that takes readers on a journey through the early days of creation and ultimately inspires personal agency.

The free eBook by Christian Alexander depicts how the ‘Creator’ granted humankind dominion and authority over the ‘Kingdom of Earth.’ When the Kingdom’s royal family disobeys the ‘Creator’ and succumbs to a serpent’s influence in the ‘Garden of Eden,’ humanity loses the Kingdom and its citizenship rights on Earth. The story follows an idealistic 12-year-old boy named ‘Ethan.’ Searching for a more meaningful life, ‘Ethan’ embarks on a quest to reclaim his natural rights in the ‘Kingdom.’

Mr. Alexander’s eBook addresses the Human Condition, a theory political philosopher Hannah Arendt first presented in 1958 that considers humankind’s inability to manage the consequences of its actions. Through storytelling, he proposes a ‘cure’ to the Human Condition and empowers readers to reclaim personal autonomy.

“I am pretty ticked off about how difficult it is for so many to find their purpose in life. It is never taught, explained, or demonstrated. We have been robbed by society, handed false hope and false promises,” Mr. Alexander says. “I hope to inspire individuals to reevaluate their own lives, break free from limiting beliefs, and embrace their innate potential.”

As an accomplished author and self-development mentor, Mr. Alexander brings his extensive knowledge and unique storytelling style to captivate readers’ minds.

A movie adaptation of “The Lost Kingdom, A True Tale” is in the works, set to premiere in 2025.

To read “The Lost Kingdom, A True Tale” and learn more about Christian Alexander Incorporated, please visit www.christianalexander.life.

###

About Christian Alexander Incorporated:

Christian Alexander Incorporated is a self-development organization that provides thought-provoking and transformative guidance. Led by author and self-development mentor Christian Alexander, the company seeks to challenge conventional wisdom and inspire individuals to realize their true potential.

Christian Alexander
Christian Alexander Incorporated
+1 702-342-1750
info@christianalexander.life

News Provided By

July 12, 2023, 13:00 GMT
